column5: Just to keep up the fear factor, and make everyone distrust everyone else....  http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap_travel/20080428...all_boat_terror
im laughing hard. on st clair a good majority are the terror. cmon down and see the drunken idiots. they think this is area 51
I think they should force all boaters and fishermem in the US to wear shirts..  and maybe anywhere TJ fishes as well.
They forgot to mention that al-qaida is training the loch ness monster to carry a nuclear weapon across the Atlantic and attack New York. Freakin' itiots!
What`s wrong with that?LOL  When I am out on my favorite lakes Scugog,Simcoe,Balsam etc. I am always on the lookout for terrorists I haven`t seen any yet but I`ll keep my eyes open.LOL

At times the stuff our government comes up with scares me. Most if not all the small water supply lakes around here no have no trespassing at night to prevent an attack, it also, maybe more importantly saves them patrol costs?
